title: 216 21 "Showdown on the Cliff! Red Light, Green Light!"Transliteration: "Dangai no Kessen! Daruma-san ga Koronda!" (Japanese:断崖の決戦!だるまさんがころんだ!) Hidehiko Kadota Yoshiyuki Suga January 9, 2005(2005-01-09)[19] July 21, 2013
transformers_text: 216 21 Showdown on the Cliff Red Light Green Light Transliteration Dang a i no K essen D arum a san ga Koro nda Japanese Hidehiko Ka dota Yoshiyuki Suga January 9 2005 2005 01 09 19 July 21 2013 Foxy decides to take Robin from Luffy this time because of her Devil Fruit ability The next match is a race to the top of the island
